content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I used the "google" command to search for information on learning about different cultures and places. My computer returned a list of websites related to the search term, including lesselfes.com, larryferlazzo.edublogs.org, shrm.org, blog.academicyear.org, au.reachout.com, beistravel.com, uagc.edu, and wikihow.com. \n\nAs you, you used the "browse_website" command to visit the website larryferlazzo.edublogs.org, which provides resources for learning about the cultures of different countries, including information on communication style, dress, gestures, musical instruments, and school lunches. It also includes photo galleries, infographics, and videos on various topics related to global culture, as well as resources for teachers such as lesson plans and handouts. The website does not provide information on specific topics of interest. \n\nLinks on the website include: \'Log in (https://larryferlazzo.edublogs.org/wp-login.php)\', \'About WordPress (https://edublogs.org/wp-admin/user/about.php)\', \'About Edublogs (https://edublogs.org/about/)\', \'Edublogs.org (https://edublogs.org/)\', \'Documentation (https://help.edublogs.org/)\'.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://larryferlazzo.edublogs.org/2010/08/11/the-best-sites-for-learning-about-the-worlds-different-cultures/"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.'}]
"""
